contents.text: Mary and her husband David have just moved to a new town , In this conversation ,Mary  will introduce herself and her husband to Jim ,their new neighbor .
contents.text_zh: 玛丽和她的丈夫大卫刚刚到搬到一个新的城镇，在下面的对话中，玛丽将向她的新邻居吉姆介绍自己和大卫。

contents.text: Please allow me to introduce myself . My name is Mary Smith .Nice to meet you .
contents.text_zh: 请允许我做个自我介绍，我叫玛丽·史密斯，很高兴认识你！

contents.text: Nice to meet you , too . My name is Jim Peters . Did you just move in next door ?
contents.text_zh: 我也很高兴认识你！我叫吉姆·皮特。你是刚刚搬到隔壁的吗？

contents.text: Yes , I did , with my husband David . He is now inside dealing with our lavatory.  Have you lived here long ?
contents.text_zh: 是的，和我丈夫大卫一起。他现在在屋里整理我们的卫生间。你在这住了很久了吗？

contents.text: Me ? I guess so . I’ve lived here for about 6 years now . Havaae you lived in America very long ?
contents.text_zh: 我？我想是的。我在这已经住了差不多6年了。你们在美国住了很久吗？

contents.text: No . Not really . When we left New Zealand and came to America we lived with a cousin in Dallas for 2 years . Where do you work, Jim ?
contents.text_zh: 不，事实上没多久。当我们离开新西兰来到美国以后，我们在达拉斯的亲戚家住了两年。你在哪工作，吉姆？

contents.text: I teach mathematis at Peach Springs Community College .What do you do ?
contents.text_zh: 我在桃树温泉社区大学教数学，你呢？

contents.text: I became nurse at the local nursery , that’s why we moved here .Previously I worked as a surgeon assistant at the Dove County Hospital .
contents.text_zh: 我在本地的托儿所做护士，这也就是我搬到这来的原因。以前我是多佛郡医院外科医生的助理。

contents.text: Oh , I see .What about your husband David ?
contents.text_zh: 哦，明白了。那你的丈夫大卫呢？

contents.text: He is mechanic at Allied Diesel . He repairs tractor engines .
contents.text_zh: 他是联合柴油机厂的机械师，他修理拖拉机引擎。

contents.text: Well I must go now . My wife slipped down the staircase last week and sprained her wrist . I have to do a load of laundry today . It was good to meet you.
contents.text_zh: 呃，我现在必须得走了。我的妻子上个星期从楼梯上滑下来扭伤了手腕。我今天得去洗一大堆衣服。见到你可真高兴。

contents.text: It was good to meet you , too , Jim .
